website_summaries.verdict: These are good all-weather leggings that help keep you cool in summer and warm in winter.
pros: Wicks sweat away from the body
A warm base layer for winter workouts
cons: These leggings run small, so you should order a size up

customer_reviews.title: These are great compression tights for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are great compression tights for the price. I hate paying $$$ for Nike or UA products but in the past those are the only ones that fit properly, especially when it comes to compression gear. I am glad I found these. I purchased the bright yellow/green since I do a lot of running early in the morning and wanted some added visibility. For reference, I am about 5' 6" with 32 waist and purchased a M and they fit great, just a little long but I am used to that with my height. Hope that helps!
customer_reviews.author: Jon S.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the use for sports and for cold weather
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing these for about a year hitting the gym, but wore them for the first time 12/13 as a baselayer for the NYC cold. First real day of cold in NYC today; I absolutely do not know how i survived year upon year without having these. The old school way was thermals and long johns, but they were thick and added weight/made you sweat. This is definitely 21st century layering. Happy with the use for sports and for cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: ShoozNclothes

customer_reviews.title: Order a size larger
customer_reviews.text: I would normally purchase a Large for my purposes but in this case there were a lot of reviews warning to buy a size bigger. That was great advice. I got the XL and they fit nicely without being too tight. I use these for my bike commute to work in the mornings and they have kept me pretty comfortable. It hasn't been too cold yet, but I don't see that being a problem as we only ever really get into the 30's at the coldest.
customer_reviews.author: M. MayTop Contributor: Raspberry Pi

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Just Unsure of Sizing
customer_reviews.text: I like these alot. They’re exactly what I was looking for in a non-insulated tight that I could wear with or without shorts over them at the gym or running, or under jeans on somewhat cold days I bike to work. At 5’9” 175# 31-32” waist, normally a 31-30 in jeans, I got the medium thinking that with recent growth in my legs, I’d need the room. They’re a little too big. Rise is too long, legs a little too long, and frankly a little “blousy.” As I had already worn them over the course of a day to test, I didn’t return, but I will get the small next time.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Good tights!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this, would have preferred a bit more compression but that an just me! Overall great
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Nunes

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfectly, I'm 5'11, 220lbs, and the extra large was perfect. I use them to protect my legs from the sun (UPF 30) while walking, and though they don't make this 53-year-old a fashion maven, they do what they were meant to do, breathe and keeping my legs cool. I wear shorts over them because no one cares about my "package." But they are VERY comfortable to where while exercising.
customer_reviews.author: J Sumner

customer_reviews.title: Replacement for AU at a better price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for work , to replace my cold gear tactical under armor , these are way better than the UA brand in my opinion and twice as warm. And half the price. Totally recommend over AU brand
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy these as I plan to go running in the Minnesota winter and I needed a nice base layer. These provide the base layer nicely. There are days when I don't run and I just wear these with shorts because they're just that comfortable. They do tend to scrunch up by the ankle however so I end up showing about an inch or two of ankle. This was expected as I didn't think they would wrap around my heel. Overall this is exactly what I was looking for and am debating buying a few more pairs. ~Pros~ Comfortable Reliable Good for winter running ~Cons~ Scrunch by the ankle
customer_reviews.author: Ezekiel Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Provides Expected Amount of Support for the Price.
customer_reviews.text: I am 69 inches tall and about 190lbs. The length of these compression tights is just fine; however, they could stand to provide more compression and support to be truly considered a compression baselayer when compared to other, more universally known major brands. Since they don't fit as tight as "the other brands" I considered the sizing "somewhat large." Since they will stretch quite a bit, I recommend trying one size smaller than your norm and give it a go.
customer_reviews.author: RickTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: For the price the product was fine. Be aware that the fabric is a little on the thin side so it can be translucent when you wear them and stretch; the white is the worst offender of showing your true colors underneath the material. I ordered the medium and they were a bit large & long but of course that depends on your body type. Not sure about the compression capabilities so if that is your main concern you may want to get a more expensive brand. These are best for extra coverage against the elements or aesthetics if you want to compliment your outfit or not show too much skin in public.
customer_reviews.author: beelzebub

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. As far as the fit goes, I'm 5'11" with a 32" waist. I ordered a large and they fit great. Not too tight or loose on my waist. Also just right on my thighs, they don't move around any, but also aren't so tight that they leave seam lines when I take them off. They only reason I didn't give them 5 stars is the seam where the pants material is sewn to the elastic waistband isn't consistent. It looks double stitched but in some places only on of the rows of stitches is on the pants material. Might just be the pair I got, I plan on ordering others.
customer_reviews.author: ZombCJ

customer_reviews.title: They're not as tight as I like compression pants to be especially on the knees where ...
customer_reviews.text: They're not as tight as I like compression pants to be especially on the knees where I need it most because of my tendinitis, otherwise good looking pants. I'm 5'11"&145 lbs so I got small guided by other brand I bought and prefer.
customer_reviews.author: diad

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Good Fit, Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought the XL size due to recommendations on the page and the size is just what I was looking for. The pants provide coverage down to my ankles and do an excellent job of trapping body heat and wicking moisture away. I have used the pants 4 times now and I am glad I made this purchase, especially as cooler weather starts to roll in. For those wondering about the XL size, I am 6'0", 180lbs. This is my first purchase of base layer pants, and I am pleasantly surprised with the comfort and flexibility of the Defender compression base layer pants.
customer_reviews.author: Alex_CA

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Effective, Durable
customer_reviews.text: Defender long-sleeve shirt and pants are comfortable, fit true-to-size,, and are durable. I selected each of these items according to the sizing chart provided a little over one year ago, and following regular usage after a year they have proven to be durable as well as effective at keeping me cool/dry in hot situations and warm/dry in cold. They're close-fitting (not loose) which helps to whisk away perspiration build-up, and are great for activities which involve becoming somewhat overheated and/or are time-consuming. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BT0414

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: When I first looked at these in person, I thought they would be way too small. After trying them on thought, they fit perfectly. I’m 6’1, wear 32x32 pants, and weigh 180 lbs for anyone who’s approximately the same size and doesn’t know which size to get... Mediums were perfect. They seem high quality, but I’m not sure how well they’ll work as a base layer in the winter just because I haven’t had a chance to try them yet. If they’re not great for it, I’ll update after I get to try them.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: FEELS AND FITS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered another pair for my husband, whose other "leggings" are ready to be retired. This is the first compression-type pants he's worn (previous ones are just underlayer types) and he loves the way they feel when he runs. When spring/summer come around, I'll be ordering the Defender shorts for him as well. As much as he runs (six days/week), these are reasonably priced so we can buy several without breaking bank just to have other well-known name brands.
customer_reviews.author: Mushi2Anone

customer_reviews.title: Thickness varies
customer_reviews.text: I am giving these only a 3-star rating as I have purchased these sport tights more than once and found that the thickness has varied. The most recently purchased tights were the thinnest, thin enough that on only the 4th or 5th wearing I discovered a pinhole had appeared along a thigh with no event to explain it. Further, being so thin, I find they aren't particularly supportive. and they're not good for exercising outdoors for temperatures below 50°F if there is any wind at all. Nevertheless, these sport tights are pretty cheap, especially if you a 3-pack. And they do make a decent base-layer to wear under your regular pants in the middle of winter.
customer_reviews.author: Robin NYC

customer_reviews.title: Great product but runs really small (then again they are ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product but runs really small (then again they are compression pants!) Ordered my son an extra small (he has a 28" waist) and he said they were too tight for him. Exchanging for a small. Hopefully they will work better! :)
customer_reviews.author: Hesli Family

customer_reviews.title: Great Baselayer Clothing
customer_reviews.text: are some of my favorite baselayer leggings so far. They seem to be made well and are not too thin and not too thick. They fit perfect and work just as expected. I love using these under my hiking pants on cold days to help retain a little heat on the legs. I am actually considering a few more pair now.
customer_reviews.author: Dean C. Neitman

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: The tights are good. They could keep one warmer as other types that I have worn keep me warmer; further, and unfortunately, the tights BLEED an orange or slightly reddish color onto whatever one is wearing over it, so if one wears a dark color, then it will not matter, but I was wearing white Gi pants and it stained them on the inside in the crouch and backside with orange coloring. It does wash out, for the most part, and if one uses bleach, then I am sure one can rid the stain, but it will stain them.
customer_reviews.author: Sensei Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Excellent high quality.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent high quality. Fits just as good as compression pants that cost $50- $100. They are not thick like the high end (expensive) Under Armour and really expensive $150ish Nike compression, but they are just as good if not better than Nike/Under Armour regular compression pants. They fit/feel as good as anything on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Trich

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice for a baselayer and are reasonably warm, especially at this price point. Do order up a size as they do run small. I wear them while riding my bike in the colder weather and they are very comfortable. I ordered the x-large as I am 6'0 and weigh 210. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Randy RowellTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price of Admission so Far
customer_reviews.text: These are a great alternative to the more expansive brands. 5'9 183 bought a medium and fit perfect for compression. Wore them on a warm 4 mile run and kept them on for a few hours after. Very comfortable and actually kept me cool afterwards. Not sure of durability but they seem that they will last. Definitely worth the price of admission so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Nice Compression Pants
customer_reviews.text: Use these for workouts but can also be worn comfortably under jeans/sweats. Material feels great and wicks moisture away. Material, while form fitting, isn't clingy, binding, or tight (unless you bought them too small)! The fit is pretty much true to size.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Not compression
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in the past and when I went to repurchase them, the sizing is way off. I had a medium and it had good compression. The new ones are loose and do not provide any compression. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: T. Utz

customer_reviews.title: comfy but little to no compression
customer_reviews.text: They were purchased for compression tights. These have very little compression. The material is thinner than expected and if they have any compression at all, it would be very little. I loved the blue color though. I guess I would consider these a low impact compression. Not sure I would buy again for compression tights but they look nice and my husband said they are pretty comfortable. He will use them for PJ's or to put under pants in the colder weather.
customer_reviews.author: Allenhouse

customer_reviews.title: Beyond Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I purchased as part of a costume for a play I am directing. The main character, a superhero, is wearing your Defender Compression Pants instead of tights. They sure look a lot better. These have a cool design that works great for us. The best thing: the hero is 6'4" with incredibly long legs and THESE FIT HIM!! When he modeled for us he said, "and they're so cool feeling (as in comfortably)"
customer_reviews.author: Lark

customer_reviews.title: Not for the modest amongst us.
customer_reviews.text: Good compression, durable. I've bought four of these and use them for the gym and post workout lounging and in the winter as undergear at the office which can be an icebox. They are comfortable and haven't chafed anywhere. They are my basic go to for workouts for allowing flexibility. I did return one for sizing (my mistake) because the ankle was way to tight. 1st pair is +1 year and still going strong despite constant washing with electric dryer.
customer_reviews.author: happy jack

customer_reviews.title: Nice compression pants that are true to size.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size medium (small was not available) and it was a great fit for my husband. My husband is a cyclist, who is 5'10" and weighs 153lbs. His waist size is 30.
customer_reviews.author: Gnlucila

customer_reviews.title: Without a doubt the best base layer clothing I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt the best base layer clothing I've ever purchased. Previous job wad in a refrigerated environment and went through all types of thermal wear in 12 years. I've had these at that job and my current which is outdoors in Seattle weather and I have to say, nothing works better, at least nothing I've tried. I don't usually like to give 5 stars because there's always room for improvement but these are just that damn impressive
customer_reviews.author: D Flo

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my brother, he has taken to wearing compression pants as undergarments since his occupation has him working around a lot of skittering bugs. Ick. Anyways, he said they were comfortable to wear, fit well, and kept nature at bay. He was very very happy to see 3 pairs under the tree =)
customer_reviews.author: Dahlya

customer_reviews.title: Great quality great price
customer_reviews.text: These compression tights are great they fit perfectly I am 6'2 240 I got the xxl and I love him. They worked well in terms of my leg days also when I was just doing cardio work and terms of running and jump rope after trying these I ended up buying two more pair great quality will easily buy from this company again just so I can have multiple colors in this product.
customer_reviews.author: LaRon J Howard

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase...needs a little stronger material
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I disliked was the fact if you slide on accident during a game the wear of the material gets worn out quickly I'm that spot. Product fit well and looks good...would just maybe find a stronger material.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Lesnicki Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this item and you won't be disappointed!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I'm blown away by the fitment and quality. I have never own a pair of compression pants in my life and I'm very self conscious of wearing anything tight fitting. This product seems to made very well. There is a small sag in the front but it's not very noticeable in my opinion. I am going to buy some more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Jones

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Base Layer!
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of training outside in the Colorado winters, I got these to try as a base layer under my sweatpants and they work perfectly! I was looking for something that wasn't too thick because I end up sweating on most occasions, this was just the right thickness I was looking for. Fit is as expected with some extra room around the junk to accommodate a baseball cup which for me made these very comfortable. Great product would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Corey Block

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a medium. These are the perfect amount of tight on your legs. They are really thin though which is the downside. Be careful putting them on because you might ruin them if your toe nail scratches them while you put them on.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Runs large, order a size down.  Nice.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a medium and they are perfect., maybe a smidge loose. I may put them in the dryer to see if they can tighten up, but pretty much perfect. I wear them in the house with a speedo underneath. This keeps from showing off my package too much. I don't wear shorts over top of them because I don't like that look.
customer_reviews.author: ARNOLD

customer_reviews.title: Loose fit. Will not keep you warm under about 40F
customer_reviews.text: The tights fit a little larger than I expected. I'm just over 6' 185# 32-34" waist, 32" inseam and bought large. As far as keeping your legs warm, I don't know how that will happen unless it's well over 40F. I walked the dogs as a test when it was just under 40 and these did absolutely nothing to keep my legs warm. I returned them after wearing for 10 min.
customer_reviews.author: refxian220

customer_reviews.title: Good base layer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend to wear when he rides his motorcycle in cooler weather. It's thin enough and comfortable enough to provide the extra warmth he needs while riding, but does not stifle him throughout the day as he keeps it under his clothes at the office.
customer_reviews.author: Kaelynn

customer_reviews.title: Got these for my 15 yr old son - he ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 15 yr old son - he plays basketball and wears these under his shorts when plays outside when it's cold. He said they keep his legs warm and that they are really comfortable- I will be buying another pair for him.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Espich

customer_reviews.title: Fits well at the waist & great on at the legs
customer_reviews.text: Fits well at the waist & great on at the legs. Thin breathable material Seems to work for blocking some UV While remaining cool and breathable and the hot sun As I am using them for the main purpose of sun protection While on duty lifeguarding. Overall they fit great on the legs while at the waist are breathable in the sun and UV light And are about to almost I’d say 2%-5% translucent while dry & 40%-50% Translucent when wet But dry pretty quick in the sun. And great for getting wet and drying real quick Maintaining their shape and texture. Excellent bye
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: I feel like SpiderMan
customer_reviews.text: The tights feel Phenomenal. I live in Florida; it is hot-hot heat here. I love the heat & yet these keep me cool, I feel great temp wise. The compression is on point allowing for greater performance with less nagging injuries. The crotch is seamed up properly In the correct position- I can sit & squat without fidgeting too much.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. The quality is on par with items from Tesla I've purchased. I just hope they hold up like the Tesla gear I have is holding up. Not quite the quality as Nike or Under Armour but not that far off either. Not quite as thick as Nike Hyperwarm but it's good for the price and works well when worn in layers.
customer_reviews.author: mmp1953Top Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: DEFENDER COMPRESSION GEAR
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes all his Defender gear -- pants, shorts, long- and short sleeved shirts. The fit is right, nice and snug as they're supposed to. As it's time to purge old running clothes, he's getting more Defender gear. It's nice to have different colors to choose from, too, so it's easier to rotate them through the week (he runs 3-4 miles daily, 6 days/week). This is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Mushi2Anone

customer_reviews.title: Defender: the name of quality?
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because I still have a pair of non-compression spandex from the year 2000, that have withstood the test of time, with only minor stretch loss. We’ll see if Defender has maintained that level of quality. These fit like normal spandex pants and were comfortable and warm enough for a day of skiing (sunny ~30-35°F). I only wore these as a base, and snow pants over them. My legs never get cold though.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: I could design a better pattern in about 10 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Look, the world is awash in these things, and it's really hard to tell them apart on-line, but here's the deal with these: * They are too short in the back, and the waistband wants to slide off me when I bend over * They're too long in front, and the waistband wants to roll * There's no drawstring * The material is too thin to do much supporting * The front panel is single-thickness, or rather, single-thinness, which means the state of your decision to circumcise or not will be readily apparent. I bought about 10 different pairs of these things, and I'm getting ready to type this review in about 9 more times. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Leggings
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear under my clothes in the winter, and they're great. They're warm, they're tight, but not too tight, and they're very comfortable. As far as leggings go, these are the best.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Fit well. Pretty much what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for something to keep you WARM, look elsewhere...these are okay as an under-layer, but do not provide warmth unto themselves. I wore them as part of a Saiyan costume for Halloween, and...it was a cold Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: jellydonut25

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: I this this. My husband got this for his workouts. Fits very well I actually try it on and it fit me as lose leggings lol(130pouns). but they supposed to be tight in you. It fit him perfectly. (210pouns)
customer_reviews.author: Marelin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 10yr old son
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 10yr old son....who happens to be in an adult M. Material/fabric is durable and comfortable. Patterns are vivid. Much better than paying a much higher amount for a different name brand when these are just as good a quality (we have both). Def recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: m morrone

customer_reviews.title: Thin material
customer_reviews.text: The product material is very thin and my legs do not stay very warm when I go hiking or snowboarding. You can clearly see my skin/leg hair under the cloth. However for the price, I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kilkus

customer_reviews.title: Warm and slick.
customer_reviews.text: I am active outdoors and ordinary "long johns" are bulky and bind under my jeans. These are perfect, keeping me warm without restricting my leg movement at all. I've purchased multiple pairs so I'll never run out.
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: Durable leggings
customer_reviews.text: These are quality leggings for working out. My thirteen year old used them for flag football. They hold up to the everyday usage and don’t rip easily when my son falls or dives for a ball. They do run about a size or two smaller than your usual size.
customer_reviews.author: peter gloria

customer_reviews.title: Good tights for the price, holding up well after washing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to play basketball in during the winter. They aren’t as thick and the compression isn’t nearly as pronounced as the UA tights I have, but those are far more expensive. For the price, these are pretty good. I’ve already worn and washed them several times and they appear to be holding up. I don’t think they are thick enough to block the cold, but if you are working out, they’ll keep your legs warm - if that makes any sense. If you are looking for affordable tights, these are a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great feel, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great material, looks great, feels great. I'm 5'6 170 lbs, the medium is a little small. I would go large next round. I wore them this am during my 10 hour shift with 40 degree weather and 15 mile an hour wind. They worked great. I was wearing carhart pants but still great feel. One huge downer, No Men's flap in the front. So, I cut a hole between the seams and that fixed the problem.
customer_reviews.author: REKOP

customer_reviews.title: Great value and fit
customer_reviews.text: These were just a tad thinner than I expected, but they still feel good and provide great compression. I am 5'11" 230 lbs and I ordered the XL, which turned out to be just about right. The only negative thing I noticed is that the seams aren't totally symmetrical. The left leg seam hits the outside of my kneecap, while the right leg seam hits the inside. Doesn't affect the performance at all, just messes with my OCD.
customer_reviews.author: A Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and seems pretty durable. We'll see how they last after a few games. But came very quick, and kept me posted every step of the way. I would buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: stacey t.

customer_reviews.title: A great value compared to the big name brands!
customer_reviews.text: I had to order these pants twice. No big deal since I got free shipping on the returns, it just took an extra week or so. Apparently this particular Defender brand runs a little larger, so I had to get Mediums, as opposed to the Large ones I have in the Nike and Under Armor brands. These are every bit as nice, but a much better price! One additional minor concern, for whatever reason, the white pair is just a little shorter than the other two pairs. (I bought a 3-pack with red, white and blue!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very nice except for the stitching. One seem had a finger size hole in it.
customer_reviews.text: these fit nicely, snugly and felt like the perfect compliment for additional warmth in the winter. However, mine came with a 1 inch gap in the stitching along one edge. doesn't make me feel good about the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Texas-Techy

customer_reviews.title: Not really compression
customer_reviews.text: They were for my son to wear under his basketball shorts- more like tights than compression pants- completely see through.
customer_reviews.author: Kari C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect underlayer
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed. A base layer that does not create annoying folds under your pants. It's literally like a 2nd skin. Quality is nice. Thin but durable
customer_reviews.author: Kemo Enriquez

customer_reviews.title: I Really Like These
customer_reviews.text: I’m an old fart that has never worn anything like this but my legs have always been larger than a NFL running back. I just wanted some to wear under my pants while at the dog park. These work great and even look good alone but under a long t-shirt. I’m definitely buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Typical Geek

customer_reviews.title: the sizing
customer_reviews.text: Only one length per waist size. I am 5'6" with a 38 in waist. There were no leg length listed on the website. I took a chance because of the price. Although the waist size is correct, the leg length was more for a person about 6'. Will give hem to someone taller than I am
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just ordered another one
customer_reviews.text: A great way to keep warm without having to wear sweats or thermals. Used this compression pants on an overnight camping and biking trip. Works great. Comfortable enough to use even while biking. Has a cool stylish look to it as well especially under some shorts. Just ordered a second one!
customer_reviews.author: Snag

customer_reviews.title: ORDER 2 SIZES LARGER!
customer_reviews.text: They're nice for the price but PURCHASE 2 SIZES LARGER IF U WEAR AMERICAN SIZES! They do the job but aren't nearly as warm as my under armour compression pants. A good product though. I'd give a 5 if warmer & was US sizes... it's a guessing game with these asian sizes...
customer_reviews.author: Bry

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I received the pants quickly and packaged well. The pants seem to be made well and they fit perfectly. I bought these to wear as an extra later during the cold weather here in the NE so I’ll edit this later if they keep me warm or not.
customer_reviews.author: Rick S

customer_reviews.title: Great under clothing, work, running and movement
customer_reviews.text: Love them, form fitting, fully range of movement. Go great under clothing for work, daily wear and for running. Great with average to warm weather a bit chilly for colder weather but still good. Wear daily.
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: good quality it was a little big on me. I'm 5 feet 7 inches. maybe 2 inches to long but I still use it. I run 10 miles with it on cold days. wicks well on hot days.
customer_reviews.author: Tioxl

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: I wear these maybe 2x a week and within 2 months the stitching started coming apart around the right ankle where it is now very loose. I used the sizing chart and it worked out well for me, they fit as expected but they didnt last long at all.
customer_reviews.author: HybridHB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love these skins. There is zero restriction of movement and they definitely add a layer of warmth for my cold winter runs. I'm 5'7", 160 lbs with a 30-inch inseam and 32" waist. The small size fits me perfectly. No bagginess but not too tight either.
customer_reviews.author: Maynard the Miser

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, nice and light, waist and secure but not too tight. Perfect! Great price too!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Not too thin but not heavy either, nice and light for under regular pants. I've ordered 3 pair for my son so I can say even after washing a few times so far they are great!
customer_reviews.author: KeWEE

customer_reviews.title: Nice gym pants
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these. The sizes are wrong but I ordered a xxlarge because China sizes are off. I'm usually a large. But they look great on me in the gym
customer_reviews.author: Mattadamsdietmanager

customer_reviews.title: Thin and warm, good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Wore under hiking pants for 18mile day hike down and up the Grand Canyon in mid December (temps 40-55 F). We’re very comfortable. Never felt too cold or over heated throughout the hike. Wore them as the only layer under ski pants in January (Temp ~ 30F). Kept me warm then as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cale Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great buy at a great price! Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a trout fishing trip. I used hip waders, and these baselayer pants did a great job keeping me warm. They fit perfectly (got an XL for a size 36 waist) underneath some jeans. For standing in a river surrounded by 40 degree water, I was very glad I made the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: B-Rad

customer_reviews.title: Cover me
customer_reviews.text: The pant is amazing. Looks and feels fantastic. It keeps me cool in the summer heat while I'm out walking 7 miles a day. My legs are no longer exposed to the harsh sun rays. Defender compression shirts and pants are the best for me. Will be buying more colors to go with my shorts.
customer_reviews.author: FlopFilm

customer_reviews.title: Defender Men's Compression Pants
customer_reviews.text: They fit pretty good, but have to use them a while. They don't fit as well as I would like, but okay. If I bought them again, I might get a size smaller. But they are well made and I would recommend them to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Hick

customer_reviews.title: Really warm!!
customer_reviews.text: Got to try these out this morning going to work. I drove a motorcycle in about 50 degree weather with these pants under my work pants. They kept me pretty warm. I’d have to say I like them. Works great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rustel Douthit

customer_reviews.title: I bought these because I have restless legs when I ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I have restless legs when I sleep, especially if I had a stressful day. The compression on my calves and thighs have helped me relax and fall into a restful sleep. I know this isn't the typical use for compression pants, but I have found some stress relief for restless legs, the few times that I have worn them to bed.
customer_reviews.author: N. M.

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: these pants are great I am so happy that I ordered them because I normally only buy this type of product in stores where I can try them on before purchasing but since I have been loosing some weight I was able to guess the size right this time. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jane Osha

customer_reviews.title: Marathon tested compression pants
customer_reviews.text: Ran with these in the 2016 Philadelphia Marathon, which was a miserably cold and windy day. These compression pants were all I was wearing below the waist and they stood up to this weather and kept me warm through the 3+ hours of running. Wish they had pockets to store energy gels, but wasn't looking for that when I first purchased the product. Love wearing these for long runs in the cold
customer_reviews.author: faridrunsTop Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: Nice thermal pants for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great compression pants fit well and very comfortable. Good price have others nit thermal and like them also best for the money
customer_reviews.author: john costanzo

customer_reviews.title: it feels great while while wearing and fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: A decent product for its price. I use it while fielding most of the times as I dive a lot for the ball. This provides a decent protection against against the scratches, while also providing enough compression to my body. Get's really hot while playing in sun! Overall, it feels great while while wearing and fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Vaibhav Sharma

customer_reviews.title: the brand ive reordered.
customer_reviews.text: 5'5" 175 muscular build. medium fits me nearly perfect. snug but not restrictive. from crotch to top of waistband is longer than some brands, but I prefer this to low rise plumbers butt. I simply fold band over once, everything stays in place. I preferred this brand to the four others ive tried... this is the one I reordered. ps, the grey is a lot lighter shade than others, almost a silver as apposed to a charcoal or heather grey. probably lighter than I would prefer, but I still wear them.
customer_reviews.author: BoojiBoy

customer_reviews.title: Super thermals!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Love these thermals!! They look and fit great and work even better. And at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Fits as it states
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. The fit is perfect. I’m 6’4” 190. So I’m tall and thin and these are long enough where they go and stay right at my ankles with no high water action and fit my 33” waist perfectly. I work outside on a graveyard shift and they keep my legs warm under my carhardt pants. I would definitely recommend these to any and all. Maybe even getting a couple pair.
customer_reviews.author: Nanci

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Quality is a little heavier and better than another brand I bought. I was very happy with these, but VERY DISAPPOINTED when I was unable to buy a second pair. It is a bummer when you find just what you want and then it is no long available and you have to buy your Second choice. :(
customer_reviews.author: Lois E.

customer_reviews.title: Order one size up if in doubt,
customer_reviews.text: As is the norm with stuff made in Asia, the sizing tends to run small. I should have fit a large, but in these I needed an XL. No big surprise there. Comfortable fit, and the crotch not using a center seam makes it quite comfortable (as compared to tights that use a center seam).
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: this is the compression pants you would like to have
customer_reviews.text: this is the compression pants you would like to have, they are so light and fresh you didnt even notice them.
customer_reviews.author: Rabiensa

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and style
customer_reviews.text: Good compression performance for serious athletes. Great value too as these are very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gaskins

customer_reviews.title: Tight, but not restricting. Very happy with them!
customer_reviews.text: Tight, but not too much where it becomes a bother. Color was as expected, quality material. Son is 5' 5", 120 pounds and a small fits great. Super satisfied and happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Fits well
customer_reviews.text: The fit was as expected. As common you will need to wear shorts over it as its semi see-thru.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: I love these leggings
customer_reviews.text: I love these leggings. They are an inexpensive and excellent solution to Under Armor. They protect my legs during warm months from the sun, insects and etc. They fit as expected. I am a 250lbs, six-foot male. I used them for running, yoga, hiking, backpacking, and everyday wear around the house. As of today, I own eight pairs with plans of buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Epic Adventures LLC

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Good material. Cheaper than UA and works. on a zero degree day, am I cold? YES. But does it make a noticable difference? Yes
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and fit perfect. The material was much better quality than I expected it to be! I wear these during the winter months too keep the muscles warm while working out at the gym. Great base layer for being out in the cold too!
customer_reviews.author: Bigmike

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: My son plays football and loves to use these for practice and games. Will continue to buy for him. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Angela C

customer_reviews.title: These fit just right. Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'11". Weight is 180lbs. Pretty slim. These fit just right. Especially after one wash. Theyre a little tight at first but after wearing and a wash they loosened up just a enough, but still fit snug. I even bought a second pair, but my first pair are still in good condition. I use them for work. Can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: comfort extreme
customer_reviews.text: My sister bought me a similar product for Christmas and liked them, using them to keep warm in the west Texas oil patch, just received these and the fit and comfort is simply divine. I will be purchasing two more.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Lloyd Duesterheft

customer_reviews.title: Great compression pants for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my son to wear under his football pants. He likes them a lot. We had a hard time finding white compression pants that didn’t have black seams so on a style note these are perfect. He’s worn them it 4 games now on turf and natural grass and they have held up. Totally feel like I’m getting a lot of bang for my buck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! I normally use these for 3 mile runs on colder or rainier Seattle days in around 30-40 degree weather. So far they've held up great, and have great airflow. I never feel too sweaty and the fit feels just right to me. I'm 5'8" and 160lbs.
customer_reviews.author: AverageJoe

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Compression Pants
customer_reviews.text: What I like about these compression pants is that they are firm. They aren't super stretchy like other ones and leave my ankles exposed which prefer the look of.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Langel

product_meta.title: Defender Men's Compression Baselayer Pants Legging Shorts Shirts Tights Running
product_meta.description:
Defender is the Performance Gear for Football Soccer Baseball Basketball Golf Hockey Tennis Running Walking 
Swimming Fitness Exercise Yoga and all Weather Sports and Activities 

The technology of Defender Skin Polyester 92%, Spandex 8% / Cool in Summer and Heat retention in Winter 
Water Metastases layer / Water Absorption layer / Quick time Dry / TWC-WAY Air Circulation

UVA/UVB Protection Protects your skin from UVA/UVB radiation during your outdoor workout


US Size Table 

X-Small = Waist 28 ~ 29 inch / Length 33 ~ 33.5 inch

Small = Waist 30 ~ 31 inch / Length 33.5 ~ 34 inch

Medium = Waist 32 ~ 33 inch / Length 34 ~ 34.5 inch

Large = Waist 34 ~ 35 inch / Length 34.5 ~ 35 inch

X-Large = Waist 36 ~ 37 inch / Length 35 ~ 35.5 inch

2X-Large = Waist 38 ~ 39 inch / Length 35.5 ~ 36 inch

Tight fitting - like a second skin Use the size Table to select your size If you prefer a looser fit, go up a size
feature_bullets: Polyester 92%, Spandex 8% - Smooth and Ultra-Soft Fabric that provides extreme comfort with very little weight without restriction - Machine Washable.
X-Small = Long Pants (Waist 28 ~ 29 inch / Length 33 ~ 33.5 inch)
Workout or Compete for all weather sports and activities - Cool in Summer and heat retention in winter.
Compression fit bolsters muscle support and increases circulation.
UPF 30 - Protects your skin from the sun's harmful rays.
